data.event: The Chail Palace is well known for its architecture, the palace was built as summer retreat by the Maharaja of Patiala during the British Raj, on the land allotted to him by the British for former's assistance in the Anglo-Nepalese War.

event.title: 1891, Maharaja Bhupinder Singh of Patiala incurred

data.event: In 1891, Maharaja Bhupinder Singh of Patiala incurred the rage of Lord Kitchener.

event.title: led to the restriction of his entry in the Indian summer

data.event: It led to the restriction of his entry in the Indian summer capital, Shimla.
